alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kleberg; Inland Kleberg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:42PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Kleberg County through 615 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Riviera Beach, or 13 miles southeast of Kingsville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Kleberg County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
